title: Games constantly crashing with new MSI event
body:
Just a thought, but every single, second or third game results in a remake due to bugsplats and people unable to connect to the game.

With the regional honour quests this is very depressing, as around 45 minutes of every hour is spent in games that don't count towards the goal, and then can't be bothered playing league anymore because it is simply a waste of time.

As someone who absolutely despises Dire Wolves I hate having to have their team displayed just for regional pride for no result over and over :(

Can whatever is causing this please be resolved quickly.

Thank you.

replies.body: It a problem with Optus an league, they are working on it
Any news ? cause its still happening ?
